<math>\begin{array}{c}\text{Effective interest rate}\Rightarrow \text{nominal interest rate:}\\ 
\mathrm{APR}=\left\lbrack \sqrt[c/\mathrm{yr}]{1+\frac{\mathrm{EFF}}{100}}-1\right\rbrack \ast c/\mathrm{yr}\ast 100\\ 
\text{where:}\\ 
c/\mathrm{yr}=\text{number of interest periods for APR}\end{array}</math>
